title: ‘A Complete Farce’: Top Brass at UCI, Visma-Lease a Bike in Beef Over Race Radio Trials
content:
UCI president Lappartient accuses Richard Plugge of spreading 'fake news' in social media spat over tests to reduce in-race radios.

Read the full article at ‘A Complete Farce’: Top Brass at UCI, Visma-Lease a Bike in Beef Over Race Radio Trials on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
